item.title: A frog for a day
item.description: Imagine that you could start every day by eating a frog. Not a real frog, of course, but a metaphorical one: the most daunting and important task on your to-do list. That’s the idea behind the book “Eat that frog!” by Brian Tracy, which I haven’t read but was inspired by its catchy title. By eating your frog first thing in the morning, you can boost your productivity and confidence for the rest of the day.
